question: 2. Usually-a-wears-Tigor-on-ascarf-windy day Arrange the jumbled words to the correct sentences! A scarfusually wears Tigor on a windy day. b. Tigor usually wears a scarfon a windy day. On a windy day usually wear a Tigor scarf. d. Usually scarf Tigor wears on a windy day. C.

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

b. Tigor usually wears a scarf on a windy day

related_questions.question:
Change these sentences into simple past tense, baseed on the given Marka in bracket! (number 1 to 3)    1. my family (go) to the cinema last week ( -, ? )

2. the student (study) in the laboratory yesterday ( +, - )

3. she (go) to Bandung two days ago (+, -)

4. the girl was very happy to hear the good news
 ( - ) .......

5. Active voice : the clever student brings a dictionary in his bag
 passive voice :.........​

answers.answer:
1. (-) my family did not go to the cinema last week.

(?) Did my family go to the cinema last week ?

2. (+) the student studied in the laboratory yesterday.

(-) the student did not study in the laboratory yesterday.

3. (+) she went to Bandung two days ago.

(-) she did not go to Bandung two days ago.

4. (-)

5. Passive voice: a dictionary is brought by student in his bag.

cmiiw

related_questions.question: apa arti mom l barowed your cluctch bag, the one with black suede colour and two side pockets l need it for bima' s birtday party tonight​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

ibu l barow tas cluctch Anda, yang dengan warna suede hitam dan dua saku samping saya membutuhkannya untuk pesta ulang tahun bima malam ini

Penjelasan:

maaf kalau salah

Ibu saya  mau pinjam dompet tanganmu, yang memiliki sisi warna hitam dan 2 saku samping, aku butuh itu untuk pesta ulang tahun bima malam ini.

Penjelasan:

Selamat Belajar :)

A Sure.
C. It doesn't matter.
B. I'm sorry
D. Anytime.​

answers.answer:
ANGIE Saya juga tidak membawa milik saya.

Tertentu.

C.Tidak ada masalah.

B.Maafkan aku

D. Kapan saja.​

MAAF KALO SALAH SEMOGA MEMBANTU

Jawaban:

B. I'm sorry

Andi : Angie, may i borrow your pen? I left mine in my room.

Angie : I didn't bring mine, either. I'M SORRY.

related_questions.question: We (go) to the beach two week ago​

answers.answer:
(went=past tense of go)
so “we went to the beach 2 weeks ago”
jangan lupa kalau weeknya lebih dari satu pakai “s” (weeks)
